desc1: Click on the map and see how far you can go during phase 0 of the de-confinement due to the COVID-19 crisis. You will also be able to see the municipal limits when you do sports.
desc2: The 1km application has been developed by geomatico. Cartography and search courtesy of Mapbox.
desc3: We do not use your personal information, your position is not collected in any case. We only use technical cookies. Code is open source.
subtitle: Click on the map over home
